title: ‘Racing for the Win’: Tadej Pogačar Braces to Blow the Doors off at Strade Bianche
content:
All-slaying Slovenian debuts season at race he won in 2022 in road toward Giro d'Italia-Tour de France double.

Read the full article at ‘Racing for the Win’: Tadej Pogačar Braces to Blow the Doors off at Strade Bianche on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
